ModMetaData.name: Justin's Gauranlen
ModMetaData.author: Justiniankoi
ModMetaData.description:
Buffs Gauranlen trees to be worth doing.
Clawer outperformed everything and some dryads made no sense to ever get. Dryad Berrymaker: Drops 100 berries was 40 Dryad Medicinemaker: Drops 6 herbs was 4 Dryad Woodmaker: Drops 120 was 32 Dryad Carrier: Move speed 2.9 was 2.4 and body size 1.3 was 0.667 Dryad Barkskin: Health scale 1.6 was 0.9
5 days is a long time to switch between dryads which encourages you to pick the best one in general not one that matches any particular situation. Dryad Cocoon: Takes 2 days was 5 days Dryad Healing Pod: Takes 2 days was 3 days
Guaranlan Decay: 1.5%, 3%, 4.5% was 2%, 4%, 6% Guaranlan Spawn Days: 4 was 8
